name: Bomb Dice
description:
Roll dice onto targets to score more points than your opponent!

Some dice have special effects.

  • Bombs will send nearby dice flying
  • Split dice will duplicate once they hit the ground
  • Bouncy dice will bounce much further than normal.

Left/Right: Aim die

Up/Down: Increase/decrease throw strength

Space: Throw die

Works best in fullscreen mode.
